title: Wiener-Lebesgue point property for Sobolev Functions on Metric Spaces
authors: M. Ashraf Bhat and G. Sankara Raju Kosuru
abstract:
We establish a Wiener-type integral condition for first-order Sobolev
functions defined on a complete, doubling metric measure space supporting a
Poincar\'e inequality. It is stronger than the Lebesgue point property, except
for a marginal increase in the capacity of the set of non-Lebesgue points.
